sentences.sContent: These applications of encapsulation, modularity , and polymorphism are implemented by the patterns.
sentences.sContent_eng: These applications of encapsulation, modularity , and polymorphism are implemented by the patterns.
sentences.sCn: 封装、模块化和多态的应用均由模式来实现。

sentences.sContent: According to the basic principle of GT and the natural characters of group fixture, providing a kind of coding scheme and the concept of "information encapsulation based on primitive".
sentences.sContent_eng: According to the basic principle of GT and the natural characters of group fixture, providing a kind of coding scheme and the concept of "information encapsulation based on primitive".
sentences.sCn: 根据成组技术基本原理和成组夹具固有特点，建立了一种简单的零件编码机制，提出了“基于体素的工艺信息封装”。

words.tran: 压缩；将…装入胶囊；将…封进内部
